content.raw:
I'm testing this now. I was wondering if it'd be better to have a pair of radio buttons somewhere to select the repeat mode, rather than having the menu pop up every time. I'm not used to the new repeat once functionality, so have no idea how much I'll utilise it, or swap between modes, but it seems annoying initially to have 2 clicks to turn repeat on, off or to the other mode.

I'm imagining a single repeat on/off button, where the icon changes depending on the mode, then somewhere else (either next to the repeat button or in a new row under the existing buttons?) a pair of buttons (or single 2 state button?) to select the mode. Alternatively, you could make the new dropdown menu a right-click menu to change between all/last mode, with left click turning the current mode on/off?
